OrientationSensor.summary: The OrientationSensor interface of the Sensor APIs is the base class for orientation sensors. This interface cannot be used directly. Instead it provides properties and methods accessed by interfaces that inherit from it.

remarks.para: This feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.

OrientationSensorPopulateMatrix.summary:
The populateMatrix() method of the
interface populates the given target matrix with the
rotation matrix based on the latest sensor reading. The rotation matrix is shown
below.

para.see: The formulas used to convert the sensor's quaternion to the provided matrix.

OrientationSensorQuaternion.summary:
The quaternion read-only
property of the interface returns a four element
whose elements contain the components of the unit
quaternion representing the device's orientation.

remarks.para:
Because is a base class, quaternion may
only be read from one of its derived classes.

OrientationSensorQuaternion.value:
An whose values are the x, y, z, and w components of the quaternion
representing the device orientation.
